---
title: "Concentration Figure Production"
output:
  html_document:
    df_print: paged
---

```{r}
library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)
library(janitor)
library(lubridate)
```

```{r}
source("~/Project_Master/Test_Rep/Code/LN_SED/40_BO/TreeNut_Mutator.R")

Tree_Nut<-read.csv2("~/NutsForSEDLN/40_BO/Output data/Biomass/Tree data.csv", header=FALSE)

Tree_Nut_Fol<-Tree_Nut %>%
  select(V1:V15)

Tree_Nut_Fol2<-Tree_Nut_Fol %>% 
  rename("Year"=V1, "Fol_Biomass"=V3, "Month"=V2, "N_Conc"=V4, "Ca_Conc"=V5,
         "Mg_Conc"=V6, "K_Conc"=V7, "S_Conc"=V8, "P_Conc"=V9, "N_Content"=V10, "Ca_Content"=V11,
         "Mg_Content"=V12, "K_Content"=V13, "S_Content"=V14, "P_Content"=V15) 
  
Tree_Nut_Fol2[c(1:15)]<-lapply(Tree_Nut_Fol2[c(1:15)], as.numeric)

AnalysisTime<-na.omit(Tree_Nut_Fol2)

AnalysisTime<-AnalysisTime %>% mutate(Date=make_date(Year, Month))


Fol_Bio<-ggplot(AnalysisTime, aes(x=Date, y=Fol_Biomass))+geom_line()+labs(x="Date", y="Foliar Biomass (kg/ha)")

Fol_Bio

Ca_Conc<-ggplot(AnalysisTime,aes(x=Date, y=Ca_Conc))+geom_line()+labs(x="Date", y=expression(Ca~Foliar~Concentration~(mu~mol/g)))

Ca_Conc

N_Conc<-ggplot(AnalysisTime,aes(x=Date, y=N_Conc))+geom_line()+labs(x="Date", y=expression(N~Foliar~Concentration~(mu~mol/g)))

N_Conc

P_Conc<-ggplot(AnalysisTime,aes(x=Date, y=P_Conc))+geom_line()+labs(x="Date", y=expression(P~Foliar~Concentration~(mu~mol/g)))

P_Conc

S_Conc<-ggplot(AnalysisTime,aes(x=Date, y=S_Conc))+geom_line()+labs(x="Date", y=expression(S~Foliar~Concentration~(mu~mol/g)))

S_Conc

K_Conc<-ggplot(AnalysisTime,aes(x=Date, y=K_Conc))+geom_line()+labs(x="Date", y=expression(K~Foliar~Concentration~(mu~mol/g)))

K_Conc

Mg_Conc<-ggplot(AnalysisTime,aes(x=Date, y=Mg_Conc))+geom_line()+labs(x="Date", y=expression(Mg~Foliar~Concentration~(mu~mol/g)))

Mg_Conc
```
